document_data.name: Pride of Nobanion
document_data.mainbody: The '''Pride of Nobanion''' was a large temple devoted to [[Nobanion]], the King of [[Lion]]s found within the city of [[Nathlekh]] on the [[Dragon Coast]].<ref name=PaP-p42">
document_data.Structure: The temple was constructed to appear as if it rose from the [[granite]] of the acropolis upon which it was founded. Many pillars arranged in colonnades supported the Pride of Nobanion's portico. The entire structure was decorated with statues of lions in various natural poses.<ref name=PaP-p42"/>
document_data.Activities: Nathlekh's judiciary, composed of a trio of [[Lammasu|greater lammasu]], held court within the Pride of Nobanion on a weekly basis.<ref name=PaP-p42"/>
document_data.Inhabitants: Many lions wandered the halls and gardens of the temple, but only harassed others if provoked.<ref name=PaP-p42"/>
